package
discuss

\disThread
jump to top

The base class for Threads, which are compilations of Posts in a Board.

This class may be extended to provide derivative functionality.

Extends from
\xPDOSimpleObject
see
\disPost
package

fetch( \xPDO $modx, \$id $id, string $type = disThread, boolean $integrated = false ) : \disThread/null
staticFetch a thread, but check permissions first
Parameters
Name Type Description
$modx \xPDO A reference to the modX instance
$id \$id The ID of the thread
$type string

The type of thread: post/message
$integrated boolean Grab by the integrated_id instead of the id
Returns
Type Description
\disThread/null The returned, grabbed thread; or false/null if not found/accessible
